channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Fly tipping and taking refuge, 19th September
item.description:
Two men have taken over abandoned space and allowing vans to come in and dump rubbish

item.title: Rotting dead fox and rubbish, 19th September
item.description:
Decomposing fox stinking with flies and rubbish at 1 Hawkwood Mount. Serious health hazard. Property wner contacted but not acting.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Hawkwood Mount, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken tiles - dangerous surface, 19th September
item.description:
Some of the tiles on the steps leading to 1-10 Quested Court are broken and move around when stepping on them. There's a high risk of someone falling, an accident waiting to happen, especially for elderly residents.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Brett Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Continual fly tipping on empty lot, 19th September
item.description:
- Private lot of land appears to have been broken into. - Continual fly tipping starting 18/09 and still going on today (19/09). - All 4 men involved wearing masks or balaclavas to hide their identities.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Green Lanes, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
